name: Flappy Stock Exchange
description:
Flappy Stock Exchange

is my entry for the "Godot Wild Jam #36 - Our third year!" - Theme: Uncontrollable Growth

Didnt had much time so i (only) came up with this small idea/prototype of an "Flappy Bird" clone. 
You cant controll the "Growth" of the stock graph, but you can controll the "Danger Zones" (like in Flappy Bird) to prevent a stock market crash.

Game Controll
  • Use the "↑"/"↓" or "W"/"S" Keys to move the "Danger Zone" up and down
  • If the stock graph collides with the obstacles (danger zone), you lose
  • The stock graph will growth (up or down) uncontrollable (randomly)
